amendment.description: To exempt lawsuits involving injuries to children from the definition of qualified civil liability action.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2633 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2633 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S1872-1873; text: CR S1872) To exempt lawsuits involving injuries to children from the definition of qualified civil liability action.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2633 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
